name: Duck Flip
description:
Hold on and release your finger to let the duck jump and splash from one pool to the next!
Do it as many times in a row as you can and try not to fall down!

Very easy to play but very hard to master !

GAME FEATURES:
* Simple and addictive gameplay: Just touch and hold the screen to charge and release to let it jump
* Endless gameplay
* Many cute and crazy characters to use along your journey!
* World wide leaderboard!
* Challenge your friends with the best highscore
